entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
